HERO.TITLE: Welcome to Bullion Beperk
HERO.SUBTITLE: Empowering you through modern, collective wealth creation

INTRO.TITLE: A Co-op for the Future
INTRO.BODY: With our unique cooperative model, Bullion Beperk helps you build wealth through collective investments in gold, silver, and other assets.

HOW.TITLE: How It Works
HOW.SUB: A smarter way to grow and secure your future wealth
HOW.POOL_DESC: Investments are pooled and unitized, enabling flexible entry and exit through your own member units.
HOW.OWNED_DESC: You own the units. The Co-op manages them transparently, with full access via secure login.
HOW.REDEEM_DESC: Redeem units in the pools for cash or precious metals with ease.

FUTURE.TITLE: Stay ahead of the curve…a move to modern financing!
FUTURE.BODY: Bullion has partnered with Fractal Global Payment Solutions to provide you with access to your very own global transactional account. Once your membership with Bullion is approved, you will receive an onboarding link to open your account—enabling seamless transactions both within South Africa and internationally.
